projects.title: Chatbot with Google Gemini for Medical Triage - Frontend
projects.description: Frontend for a medical triage chatbot. This was developed as a concept test for a research project presented at the Catholic University of Pernambuco.

projects.title: Chatbot with Google Gemini for Medical Triage - Backend
projects.description: Backend for a medical triage chatbot. This was developed as a concept test for a research project presented at the Catholic University of Pernambuco.

projects.title: RESTful API for an automotive e-commerce platform
projects.description: A REST API for Autofacil, a university project for a ecofriendly e-commerce for second hand vehicles.

projects.description: A REST API for simple webbloging. The backbone of my personal blog.

projects.title: Taylor Swift's TTPD
projects.description: What's the difference between the many versions of Taylor Swift's The Tortured Poets Departament? I set up this project to practice eventListeners and to organize info for fans.
